name: sloppy eater MEAL DEAL EDITION
description:
A new and improved version of the classic sloppy eater game!

Get to the meat at the end of the supermarket without running out of blood!

WASD to move

LMB to spit blood

E to drink blood

Shift to sneak

Esc to pause

This game was originally developed for the 2021 GMTK Game Jam:

The game has a blood meter, which is tied to both your movement and attack.

RIP
